metadata.Title: CVE-2016-4313 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Directory traversal vulnerability in unzip/extract feature in eXtplorer 2.1.9 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary files via a .. (dot dot) in an archive file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-4313` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

extplorer - 2.1.0b6+dfsg.3-4+deb7u4build0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: extplorer package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1.0b6+dfsg.3-4+deb7u4build0.14.04.1').
